titleInfo.title: I'm On Special Today - James A. Disney and Brenda Carter performance - 1970

mods.abstract: Performance of I'm On Special Today, as performed by James A. Disney and Brenda Carter and published by Cedarwood Publishing Company in 1970. Words and music by James A. Disney and Brenda Carter.
